Reviews.Title: Lenovo Edge
Reviews.Author: Karl Kaluhiokalani
Reviews.Content: Purchased the Lenovo Edge E430c for light duty in sales.  Size and weight are well suited to be mobile.  Unit isa bit underpowered and upon start-up, takes an extreme amount of time to load.  Recommend getting additional ram to speed up booting.

Reviews.Title: ThinkPad E430c
Reviews.Author: Vincent C.
Reviews.Content: A perfectly functional package for home or small business.  It needs a little more RAM than what was installed, but it's a workhorse and never lets me down.

Reviews.Title: Fan error on startup, too slow
Reviews.Author: saurabh shah
Reviews.Content: Always displays a fan error on start-up right from day 1. Was sent to Lenovo, but problem persists.Device is too slow, even with CPU in performance mode, probably because of low 2GB RAM.Was purchased in April 2013 and in Jan 2014 the Camera stopped working all of a sudden.Lenovo says warranty has expired, even though it hasn't even been a year since purchase.
